objectives: Students will discuss shopping and consumer behavior using Neutral/Standard register language
Students will engage with Action/Adventure themed scenarios related to shopping and consumer behavior
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of neutral level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining shopping and consumer behavior content with Action/Adventure narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore shopping and consumer behavior through a Action/Adventure lens using Neutral/Standard language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a high-stakes action sequence involving shopping and consumer behavior

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice neutral register vocabulary related to shopping and consumer behavior in a action context
Students engage in action themed role-play about shopping and consumer behavior using neutral register
Students create original action themed content about shopping and consumer behavior in neutral register

discussion_questions: How would you describe shopping and consumer behavior in a Action/Adventure scenario?
What chase or pursuit might be involved in shopping and consumer behavior?
Can you create a Action/Adventure story about shopping and consumer behavior?
How does shopping and consumer behavior change when viewed through a Action/Adventure perspective?
What neutral register expressions would you use to discuss this action scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Action/Adventure situation involving shopping and consumer behavior
roles: Character A: Using neutral register in action context
Character B: Responding in neutral register within action theme

topic_genre_blend: shopping and consumer behavior with chase
shopping and consumer behavior with pursuit
shopping and consumer behavior with danger

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Neutral/Standard throughout: Standard professional communication
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Action/Adventure theme: High energy, excitement, physical challenges

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Neutral/Standard register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Action/Adventure themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of neutral register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
